00027 #include <string.h>

00029 #include <pthread.h>

00031 #include "lnp.h"
00032 #include "lnp_routing_table.h"
00033 #include "lnp_store.h"

00039 routing_entry_t routing_table[ROUTING_TABLE_SIZE];
00040 
00041 /*============================================================================*/
00042 /* Private data definitions.                                                  */

00045 /*
00046  * 
00047  */
00048 static pthread_mutex_t routing_table_mutex;
00049 
00050 /*
00051  * 
00052  */
00053 static pthread_mutex_t lnp_routing_entry_mutexes[ROUTING_TABLE_SIZE];
00054 
00055 /*
00056  * 
00057  */
00058 static pthread_cond_t lnp_routing_handshake_condition[ROUTING_TABLE_SIZE];
00059 
00060 /*
00061  * 
00062  */
00063 static int used_entries = 0;

00072 static int slot_cmp(int routing_entry_index, net_id_t id);

00084 /*============================================================================*/

00088 int lnp_routing_table_initialize() {
00089         int i;
00090         for (i = 0; i < ROUTING_TABLE_SIZE; i++) {
00091                 pthread_mutexattr_t mta;
00092                 if (pthread_mutexattr_init(&mta)!=0) {
00093                         return LNP_ERROR;
00094                 }
00095                 if (pthread_mutexattr_settype(&mta, PTHREAD_MUTEX_RECURSIVE) != 0) {
00096                         return LNP_ERROR;
00097                 }
00098                 if (pthread_mutex_init(&lnp_routing_entry_mutexes[i], &mta)!=0) {
00099                         return LNP_ERROR;
00100                 }
00101                 if (pthread_cond_init(&lnp_routing_handshake_condition[i], NULL)!=0) {
00102                         return LNP_ERROR;
00103                 }
00104                 routing_table[i].store_index = NULL_SLOT;
00105         }
00106         pthread_mutex_init(&routing_table_mutex, NULL);
00107         lnp_key_store_initialize();
00108         
00109         return LNP_OK;
00110 }
00111 /******************************************************************************/
00112 int lnp_lookup_id(net_id_t id) {
00113         pthread_mutex_lock(&routing_table_mutex);
00114         u_int index = find_id(id);
00115         if (index == LNP_LOOKUP_ERROR) {
00116                 pthread_mutex_unlock(&routing_table_mutex);
00117                 return LNP_LOOKUP_ERROR;        
00118         }
00119         if (routing_table[index].is_used) {
00120                 pthread_mutex_unlock(&routing_table_mutex);
00121                 return index;
00122         }
00123         pthread_mutex_unlock(&routing_table_mutex);
00124         return LNP_LOOKUP_ERROR;
00125 }
00126 /******************************************************************************/
00127 int lnp_add_id(net_id_t id) {
00128         pthread_mutex_lock(&routing_table_mutex);
00129         u_int index = find_id(id);
00133         if (used_entries == ROUTING_TABLE_SIZE-1) {
00134                 pthread_mutex_unlock(&routing_table_mutex);
00135                 return index;
00136         }
00137         if (!routing_table[index].is_used) {
00138                 routing_table[index].is_used = 1;
00139                 routing_table[index].store_index = NULL_SLOT;
00140                 memcpy(routing_table[index].id, id, sizeof(net_id_t));
00141                 used_entries++;
00142         }
00143         pthread_mutex_unlock(&routing_table_mutex);
00144         return index;
00145 }
00146 /******************************************************************************/
00147 int lnp_remove_id(net_id_t id) {
00148         int j;
00149         int k;
00150         
00151         pthread_mutex_lock(&routing_table_mutex);
00152         u_int index = find_id(id);
00153         if (index == LNP_LOOKUP_ERROR || !routing_table[index].is_used) {
00154                 pthread_mutex_unlock(&routing_table_mutex);
00155                 return LNP_LOOKUP_ERROR;        
00156         }
00157         
00158         j = (index + 1) % ROUTING_TABLE_SIZE;
00159         while (routing_table[j].is_used) {
00160                 k = hash_function(routing_table[j].id);
00161                 if (((j>index) && (k<=index || k>j)) 
00162                                 || ((j<index) && (k<=index && k>j))) { 
00163                         memcpy(&routing_table[index], &routing_table[j], 
00164                                         sizeof(routing_entry_t));
00165                         index = j;
00166                 }
00167                 j = (j + 1) % ROUTING_TABLE_SIZE;
00168         }
00169 
00170         routing_table[index].is_used = 0;
00171         used_entries--;
00172         pthread_mutex_unlock(&routing_table_mutex);
00173         return 1;
00174 }
00175 /******************************************************************************/
00176 int lnp_routing_entry_lock(net_id_t id) {
00177         int routing_entry_index = lnp_lookup_id(id);
00178         if (routing_entry_index == LNP_LOOKUP_ERROR) {
00179                 return LNP_LOOKUP_ERROR;        
00180         }
00181         pthread_mutex_lock(&lnp_routing_entry_mutexes[routing_entry_index]);
00182         
00183         /* avoid concurrency error */
00184         if (!routing_table[routing_entry_index].is_used) {
00185                 pthread_mutex_unlock(&lnp_routing_entry_mutexes[routing_entry_index]);
00186                 return LNP_LOOKUP_ERROR;        
00187         }
00188         
00189         return routing_entry_index;
00190 }
00191 /******************************************************************************/
00192 void lnp_routing_entry_unlock(int routing_entry_index) {
00193         if ((routing_entry_index<0) || (routing_entry_index>=ROUTING_TABLE_SIZE)) {
00194                 /* TODO: este if talvez seja desnecessario */
00195                 return; 
00196         }
00197         pthread_mutex_unlock(&lnp_routing_entry_mutexes[routing_entry_index]);
00198 }
00199 /******************************************************************************/
00200 void lnp_routing_entry_condwait(int routing_entry_index, int miliseconds) {
00201         struct timeval time;
00202         struct timespec delay;
00203         int ret;
00204         
00205         gettimeofday(&time, NULL);
00206         delay.tv_nsec = time.tv_usec * 1000 +
00207                         (((long)miliseconds) % 1000) * 1000 * 1000;
00208 
00209         /* If nsec is bigger than a second. */
00210         if (delay.tv_nsec > 1000000000) {
00211                 delay.tv_sec = time.tv_sec + delay.tv_nsec / 1000000000 +
00212                                 ((long)miliseconds) / 1000;
00213                 delay.tv_nsec %= 1000000000;
00214         } else {
00215                 delay.tv_sec = time.tv_sec + miliseconds / 1000;
00216         }
00217         
00218         ret = pthread_cond_timedwait(
00219                                 &lnp_routing_handshake_condition[routing_entry_index],
00220                                 &lnp_routing_entry_mutexes[routing_entry_index], 
00221                                 &delay);
00222 }
00223 /******************************************************************************/
00224 void lnp_routing_entry_signal(int routing_entry_index) {
00225         pthread_cond_broadcast(
00226                         &lnp_routing_handshake_condition[routing_entry_index]); 
00227 }
00228 
00229 /*============================================================================*/
00230 /* Private functions implementations.                                         */
00231 /*============================================================================*/
00232 
00233 int find_id(net_id_t id) {
00234         u_int first_hash = hash_function(id);
00235         u_int hash = first_hash;
00236         while (routing_table[hash].is_used 
00237                         && (slot_cmp(hash, id) != 0)) {
00238                 hash = (hash + 1) % ROUTING_TABLE_SIZE;
00239                 if (hash == first_hash) {
00240                         return LNP_LOOKUP_ERROR;
00241                 }
00242         }
00243         return hash;
00244 }
00245 /******************************************************************************/
00246 u_int hash_function(net_id_t id) {
00247         /* TODO otimizar, usando & no lugar de % */
00248         return (*((u_int*)id)) % ROUTING_TABLE_SIZE;
00249 }
00250 /******************************************************************************/
00251 int slot_cmp(int routing_entry_index, net_id_t id) {
00252         /* TODO otimizar: comparar a partir do 4o byte, pois 
00253          * o hash jah sao os 4 primeiros */
00254         int r = memcmp(routing_table[routing_entry_index].id, id, sizeof(net_id_t));
00255         return r;
00256 }
